title: (x) Britanica / similar to Helvetica - New Rail Alphabet {Michael Hernan}
content:
Hi Typophiles

I am looking for the font named "Britanica". Cannot find it anywhere. I only have a very poor print of it, but it looks a bit like Helvetica Neue Ultra Light...
author: jaksi

comments.content:
Could the name be similar, like [Britannic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100317145550/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/britannic/)?

- Mike Yanega

.. Made all the more confusing because there is also a [Britannia](http://web.archive.org/web/20100317145550/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atbritannia-bold/), which has only a Bold weight in this case.

- Mike Yanega
Thanx for the feedback! Spot on with the New Rail Alphabet. Did not have much to go by, so I really appriciate the comments.
